data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: San Simeon, California, USA (SSM001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at San Simeon, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a StowAway Tidbit Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. TBI32-05+37) beginning 2010-07-01. The instrument depth was 021 meters, in an overall water depth of 22 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
